Package Application.Reference

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
Application.Reference.Constants
public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
Constants: The class used to store commonly used values. The single point of reference for Application variables to be updated.
Author:
David Bulyaki
See Also:
Application

    • APP_ICON

      public static final java.lang.String APP_ICON
      APP_ICON: The artwork's filepath for the application's icon normally located on the top, left-hand corner of the GUI. Also appears as the task-bar icon when the application is running.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • LEFT_FEATURES_WIDTH

      public static final int LEFT_FEATURES_WIDTH
      LEFT_FEATURES_WIDTH: The minimum width of the GUI's left column, in pixels.

      Constant Field Values

      public static final int RIGHT_FEATURES_WIDTH
      RIGHT_FEATURES_WIDTH: The minimum width of the GUI's right column, in pixels.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SCROLL_BAR_WIDTH

      public static final int SCROLL_BAR_WIDTH
      SCROLL_BAR_WIDTH: A width allowance to account for the thickness of the scroll bars. Set at absolute minimum value.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SCROLL_BAR_PACKING

      public static final int SCROLL_BAR_PACKING
      SCROLL_BAR_PACKING: A width allowance to account for practical thickness of the scroll bars. Ensures the GUI's minimum width does not surpass an undesirable appearance.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • MIN_APP_WIDTH

      public static final int MIN_APP_WIDTH
      MIN_APP_WIDTH: The minimum width of the application, in pixels. Computed by adding the width of the left column, active trades graphics objects and right column.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • TITLE_BAR_PACKING

      public static final int TITLE_BAR_PACKING
      TITLE_BAR_PACKING: A height allowance to account for practical thickness of the title bar. Ensures the GUI's minimum height does not surpass an undesirable appearance.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • MIN_APP_HEIGHT

      public static final int MIN_APP_HEIGHT
      MIN_APP_HEIGHT: The minimum height of the application, in pixels.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_SCREEN_SIZE

      public static final java.awt.Dimension DEFAULT_SCREEN_SIZE
      DEFAULT_SCREEN_SIZE: The screen size of the application, of type Dimension.
